services.title: Web Development Services — MERN Stack & Modern Frameworks
services.description: Full-stack web development using React, Node.js, MongoDB, and Express. Custom websites and web applications with responsive design and SEO optimization.
features: Deployment support (Netlify, Vercel, or custom server)

services.title: Mobile App Development — Flutter & React Native
services.description: Cross-platform Android and iOS apps using Flutter and Firebase for seamless performance and real-time sync.
features: App Store & Play Store deployment support

services.title: AI Chatbot Development — Intelligent Customer Support
services.description: Custom AI-powered chatbots for websites and apps, trained on your own data for better customer engagement and support automation.

services.title: Cybersecurity Consulting — Security Audits & Protection
services.description: Comprehensive cybersecurity services including security audits, penetration testing, and protection strategies for businesses.

services.title: AI Automation Services — Workflow Optimization
services.description: Automate business workflows with AI agents, custom scripts, and intelligent process optimization to increase productivity.

services.title: EdTech Platform Development — Learning Management Systems
services.description: E-learning platforms with video streaming, live sessions, course management, and payment integration for educational institutions.
